title: The Creeps by John Connolly (ePub Retail)
description:
In this clever and quirky follow-up to The Gates and The Infernals, Samuel JohnsonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life seems to have finally settled downÃ¢â‚¬â€after all, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s still got the company of his faithful dachshund Boswell and his bumbling demon friend Nurd; he has foiled the dreaded forces of darkness not once but twice; and heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s now dating the lovely Lucy Highmore.

Shadows are gathering in the skies; a black heart of pure evil is bubbling with revenge; and it rather looks as if the Multiverse is about to come to an end, starting with Biddlecombe. When a new toy shopÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s opening goes terrifyingly awry, Samuel must gather a ragtag band of dwarfs, policemen, and very polite monsters to face down the greatest threat the Multiverse has ever known, not to mention assorted vampires, a girl with an unnatural fondness for spiders, and highly flammable unfriendly elves.
